name: The Languid Eye
unlock_method: Level 12 in Herald of the Tome
base_effect: Open a portal to Apocrypha and unleash a torrent of Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage over 5 seconds to enemies in front of you. Consumes Crux to increase the duration by 1 second per Crux consumed.

name: Tide King's Gaze
base_effect: Open a portal and unleash Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage over 5 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase duration. Deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

name: Remedy Cascade
base_effect: Open a portal and unleash Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage to enemies and healing allies in the area over 5 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase duration.

name: Runeblades
unlock_method: Unlocked at Herald of the Tome Rank 1
base_effect: Conjure ethereal blades and fling them at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Generates one Crux.

name: Writhing Runeblades
base_effect: Conjure ethereal blades and fling them at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage and additional Magic Damage over 12 seconds. Generates one Crux.

name: Escalating Runeblades
base_effect: Conjure ethereal blades and fling them at an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Generates one Crux. Deals increased damage for each Crux you have.

name: Abyssal Impact
base_effect: Conjure a tentacle and slam it down on an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Consumes Crux to increase damage by 33% per Crux spent.

name: Cephaliarch's Flail
base_effect: Conjure a tentacle and slam it down on an enemy, dealing Magic Damage. Consumes Crux to increase damage. Deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

name: Tentacular Dread
base_effect: Conjure tentacles and slam them down, dealing Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies. Consumes Crux to increase damage.

name: Fatecarver
base_effect: Channel a beam of Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage over 4 seconds to enemies in front of you. Consumes Crux to increase the beam's damage by 20% per Crux spent.

name: Exhausting Fatecarver
base_effect: Channel a beam of Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage over 4 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase damage. Applies Minor Breach, reducing Armor.

name: Pragmatic Fatecarver
base_effect: Channel a beam of Abyssal energy, dealing Magic Damage over 4 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase damage. Grants Minor Protection while channeling, reducing damage taken by 5%.

name: Tome-Bearer's Inspiration
base_effect: Consult your tome to gain Major Brutality and Major Sorcery, increasing Weapon and Spell Damage by 20% for 20 seconds. Generates one Crux.

name: Recuperative Treatise
base_effect: Consult your tome to gain Major Brutality and Major Sorcery for 20 seconds. Generates one Crux. Also grants Major Mending, increasing healing done by 16%.

name: Inspired Scholarship
base_effect: Consult your tome to gain Major Brutality and Major Sorcery for 20 seconds. Generates one Crux. Your beam attacks restore 300 Magicka per tick while active.

name: The Imperfect Ring
base_effect: Inscribe a rune of dark power at the target location. Enemies in the area take Magic Damage over 12 seconds and are afflicted with Minor Maim, reducing damage dealt by 5%.

name: Rune of Displacement
base_effect: Inscribe a rune at the target location. Enemies take Magic Damage over 12 seconds and are afflicted with Minor Maim. Can reactivate to teleport to the rune.

name: Rune of Eldritch Horror
base_effect: Inscribe a rune at the target location. Enemies take Magic Damage over 12 seconds and are afflicted with Minor Maim. Enemies are also afflicted with Minor Vulnerability, increasing damage taken by 5%.

name: Hideous Clarity
base_effect: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing while you have Crux.

name: Recuperation
base_effect: When you consume Crux, restore Magicka and Stamina.

rank_progression.1: Restore 500 Magicka and Stamina per Crux consumed
rank_progression.2: Restore 1000 Magicka and Stamina per Crux consumed

name: Distorted Reality
base_effect: Your Herald of the Tome abilities ignore a percentage of enemy Armor.

name: Determined Resolve
base_effect: While in combat, gain stacks of Determination, increasing your Weapon and Spell Damage.

rank_progression.1: 70 Weapon and Spell Damage per stack, max 3 stacks
rank_progression.2: 140 Weapon and Spell Damage per stack, max 3 stacks

name: Gibbering Shield
base_effect: Conjure a massive shield of writhing tentacles, granting you and nearby allies a powerful damage shield for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase the shield's strength by 50% per Crux consumed.

name: Sanctum of the Abyssal Sea
base_effect: Conjure a shield of tentacles granting you and allies a damage shield for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase strength. Also grants Minor Resolve, increasing Armor.

name: Bastion of the Boundless
base_effect: Conjure a shield of tentacles granting you and allies a damage shield for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase strength. Shield persists through fatal damage once.

name: Runemend
unlock_method: Unlocked at Soldier of Apocrypha Rank 1
base_effect: Inscribe a rune of restoration on yourself, healing for an amount based on your Max Health. Generates one Crux.

name: Evolving Runemend
base_effect: Inscribe a rune of restoration on yourself, healing for an amount based on your Max Health and additional healing over 8 seconds. Generates one Crux.

name: Audacious Runemend
base_effect: Inscribe a rune of restoration, healing yourself and a nearby ally for an amount based on your Max Health. Generates one Crux.

name: Reconstructive Domain
base_effect: Manifest a whirling chakram of Apocryphal runes that circles around you, healing you and nearby allies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

name: Chakram Shields
base_effect: Manifest a whirling chakram that circles around you, healing you and allies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Also grants a small damage shield when healing.

name: Chakram of Destiny
base_effect: Manifest a whirling chakram that circles around you, healing you and allies and dealing Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds.

name: Runespite Ward
base_effect: Etch a rune of warding upon yourself, granting a damage shield for 6 seconds. When the shield expires, it deals Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Spiteward of the Lucid Mind
base_effect: Etch a rune of warding upon yourself, granting a damage shield for 6 seconds. Shield expires and deals Magic Damage. Restores Magicka when the shield expires.

name: Impervious Runeward
base_effect: Etch a rune of warding upon yourself, granting a stronger damage shield for 6 seconds. Shield expires and deals Magic Damage.

name: Apocryphal Gate
base_effect: Open a portal at the target location for 10 seconds. Reactivate to teleport to the portal and generate one Crux.

name: Passage Between Worlds
base_effect: Open a portal for 10 seconds. Reactivate to teleport and generate one Crux. Allies can also use the portal to teleport.

name: Fleet-Footed Gate
base_effect: Open a portal for 10 seconds. Reactivate to teleport and generate one Crux. Gain Major Expedition after teleporting, increasing Movement Speed by 30% for 5 seconds.

name: Vitalizing Glyphic
base_effect: Inscribe a glyphic of restoration at the target location. Allies standing in the area are healed every 1 second for 8 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase healing by 20% per Crux consumed.

name: Glyphic of the Tides
base_effect: Inscribe a glyphic at the target location. Allies in the area are healed and granted Minor Courage, increasing Weapon and Spell Damage. Consumes Crux to increase healing.

name: Glyphic of Magicka
base_effect: Inscribe a glyphic at the target location. Allies in the area are healed and have Magicka restored. Consumes Crux to increase healing and Magicka restoration.

name: Cruxweaver Armor
base_effect: Increases your Armor while you have Crux.

name: Resilient Scribe
base_effect: Reduces the cost of Break Free and Roll Dodge while you have Crux.

name: Deliberate Ritual
base_effect: Increases your Magicka Recovery.

name: Focused Advance
base_effect: Increases your damage done with Soldier of Apocrypha abilities.

name: Vitalizing Glyphic
base_effect: Inscribe a massive glyph of restoration, healing you and allies in the area every 1 second for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase healing by 30% per Crux consumed.

name: Restorative Burst
base_effect: Inscribe a massive glyph of restoration, healing allies every 1 second for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux. Initial cast also provides a large burst heal.

name: Abyssal Wellspring
base_effect: Inscribe a massive glyph of restoration, healing allies every 1 second for 10 seconds. Consumes Crux. Allies in the area also restore Magicka and Stamina.

name: Arcanist's Domain
base_effect: Establish a domain of restorative power around you, healing you and nearby allies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Generates one Crux per heal tick.

name: Domain of Restoration
base_effect: Establish a domain of restorative power around you, healing allies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Generates Crux. Increases healing received by allies in the area.

name: Domain of the Tomes
base_effect: Establish a domain of power around you, healing allies and dealing Magic Damage to enemies every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. Generates Crux.

name: Apocryphal Restoration
base_effect: Channel the power of Apocrypha to heal an ally. Consumes Crux to increase healing by 50% per Crux consumed.

name: Curative Surge
base_effect: Channel the power of Apocrypha to heal an ally. Consumes Crux to increase healing. Also heals a second nearby ally for a reduced amount.

name: Renewing Restoration
base_effect: Channel the power of Apocrypha to heal an ally and apply a heal over time for 6 seconds. Consumes Crux to increase healing.

name: Runic Aegis
base_effect: Create a runic barrier around you and nearby allies, granting a damage shield for 6 seconds. Generates one Crux.

name: Unbreakable Aegis
base_effect: Create a stronger runic barrier around you and allies, granting a damage shield for 6 seconds. Generates one Crux.

name: Healing Aegis
base_effect: Create a runic barrier around you and allies, granting a damage shield for 6 seconds. When the shield expires, allies are healed. Generates one Crux.

name: Fulminating Rune
base_effect: Inscribe a rune at the target location. After 2 seconds, the rune explodes, dealing Magic Damage to enemies and healing allies in the area.

name: Eruptive Rune
base_effect: Inscribe a rune at the target location. After 2 seconds, the rune explodes dealing increased Magic Damage to enemies and healing allies.

name: Sustaining Rune
base_effect: Inscribe a rune at the target location. After 2 seconds, the rune explodes dealing Magic Damage to enemies and providing increased healing to allies with a heal over time.

name: Purifying Light
base_effect: Unleash purifying energy, cleansing up to 2 negative effects from you and nearby allies. Also grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing Armor and Spell Resistance for 5 seconds.

name: Consecrated Light
base_effect: Unleash purifying energy, cleansing up to 3 negative effects from you and allies. Grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward for 5 seconds.

name: Luminous Blessing
base_effect: Unleash purifying energy, cleansing 2 negative effects and healing you and allies. Grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward for 5 seconds.

name: Runic Transference
base_effect: Increases your healing done while you have Crux.

name: Erudition
base_effect: Reduces the cost of Curative Runeforms abilities.

name: Apocryphal Insight
base_effect: When you generate Crux, gain Minor Intellect and Minor Endurance, increasing Magicka and Stamina Recovery.

name: Scholarly Mastery
base_effect: Increases your Max Magicka.
